Conference.query: What insights can be drawn from the layered distribution of papers by conference?

PaperType.query: What insights can be drawn from the layered distribution of paper types?

CitationImpact.query: How is the distribution of citation impact categories visually represented?

Year.query: How do publication patterns evolve over the years with visual annotations?

  "layer": [
    {
      "mark": "line",
      "encoding": {
        "x": {"field": "Year", "type": "temporal", "title": "Year"},
        "y": {"field": "submission_count", "type": "quantitative", "title": "Submission Count"},
        "color": {"field": "Conference", "type": "nominal", "title": "Conference"}
      }
    },
    {
      "mark": "point",
      "encoding": {
        "x": {"field": "Year", "type": "temporal"},
        "y": {"field": "submission_count", "type": "quantitative"},
        "color": {"field": "Conference", "type": "nominal"},
        "tooltip": [
          {"field": "Year", "type": "temporal"},
          {"field": "Conference", "type": "nominal"},
          {"field": "submission_count", "type": "quantitative"}
        ]
      }
    }
  ],
  "selection": {
    "brush": {"type": "interval", "encodings": ["x"]},
    "grid": {"type": "interval", "bind": "scales"}
  }
}

Conference & PaperType.query: How do paper types vary across different conferences?

Conference & CitationImpact.query: Explore the conference and citation impact landscape through a multi-faceted visual approach

      {"Year": 2019, "PaperType": "J", "count": 120},

      {"Year": 2021, "PaperType": "J", "count": 109},

      {"Year": 2023, "PaperType": "J", "count": 133},
      {"Year": 2024, "PaperType": "J", "count": 124}
    ]
  },
  "mark": {
    "type": "area",
    "interpolate": "basis",
    "tooltip": true
  },
  "encoding": {
    "x": {
      "field": "Year",
      "type": "temporal",
      "axis": {"title": "Year"}
    },
    "y": {
      "aggregate": "sum",
      "field": "count",
      "type": "quantitative",
      "axis": {"title": "Number of Papers"}
    },
    "color": {
      "field": "PaperType",
      "type": "nominal",
      "scale": {"scheme": "category20b"},
      "legend": {"title": "Paper Type"}
    }
  },
  "transform": [
    {
      "stack": "count",
      "groupby": ["Year"],
      "sort": [{"field": "PaperType"}]
    }
  ],
  "params": [
    {
      "name": "hover",
      "select": {"type": "point", "on": "mouseover", "clear": "mouseout"}
    }
  ]
}
